general.name: NetLogix - ThreatLocker Installer [WIN]
general.description: Installs the ThreatLocker software on a Windows PC. Requires a license either given via the input variable or via a Site/Account-level variable named usrTLSerialSITE.

variable.name: usrTLSerial
variable.description: Your 36-character ThreatLocker license key. Leave this blank if you are using a Site-level key (named usrTLSerialSITE).
